dmca.title: DMCA Form For MOVIES-GALLERIES-VIDEOS.COM
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Christopher Rumpf [mailto:crumpf@parallel-evolution.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 15, 2007 6:14 PM
To: Legal; Copyright
Cc: 'Christopher Rumpf'
Subject: DMCA Form For MOVIES-GALLERIES-VIDEOS.COM


Hello The Planet Legal Department,
 
Sorry to bother you.
 
I am contacting you regarding a domain which you are hosting named:
MOVIES-GALLERIES-VIDEOS.COM <http://www.littlemidgets.com/> 
 
This website contains harmful/slanderous material to my family.  Also the domain
owner does not have permission from Jennifer to publish photos of her.   They do not
own the rights to the photos either.
 
Can we please work together to have the domain owner be sensitive to us/our request?
 
We have attempted to contact the owner of the domain directly but have not been
successful in that regard.
 
Thank you for your time,
/* ---
     Christopher Rumpf
     crumpf@parallel-evolution.com <mailto:crumpf@parallel-evolution.com> 
     mobile: 619.254.0811
     yim: mrrumpf
--- */
 
   Domain Name: MOVIES-GALLERIES-VIDEOS.COM
   Registrar: TUCOWS INC.
   Whois Server: whois.opensrs.net
   Referral URL: http://domainhelp.tucows.com
   Name Server: NS1.SERVERMATRIX.COM
   Name Server: NS2.SERVERMATRIX.COM
   Status: ok
   Updated Date: 21-sep-2006
   Creation Date: 17-aug-2004
   Expiration Date: 17-aug-2007
   Server Name: NS1.SERVERMATRIX.COM
   IP Address: 207.44.128.228
   IP Address: 207.44.128.229
   IP Address: 70.86.61.133
   IP Address: 70.86.61.134
   IP Address: 70.87.7.70
   IP Address: 70.87.7.71
   Registrar: THE PLANET INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
   Whois Server: whois.theplanet.com
   Referral URL: http://www.theplanet.com

 
Here is the inline text based version of the DMCA form in case you can not receive
.doc attachments.
Monday, January 15, 2007

Notification of Claimed Copyright Infringement 

(Digital Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C.
